Name: Wind Particle Lv.3
Description: Alchemy material used to craft Wind Serum and Wind Drop.
Description$english: Alchemy material used to craft Wind Serum and Wind Drop.
Description2$english: A crystal particle of the Wind, with the melody of wind dancing gracefully within the crystal. Like clouds drifting through valleys, it silently speaks of freedom.

recipes.Name: Wind Particle Lv.3
recipes.Des: Alchemy material used to craft Wind Serum and Wind Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.
recipes.Des$english: Alchemy material used to craft Wind Serum and Wind Drop. Obtained from Artisanry​.

NeedMaterial.Name: Wind Crystal Shard Lv.3
NeedMaterial.Description: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Can be obtained during Monster Hunts, and after precise processing, it can be used for Alchemy. It is a basic material.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: A crystal rich in Engram. Easy to collect and process. Due to absorbing Engram from the atmosphere and underground during crystallization, its specific composition and shape vary by region.
